concept.display: T3: Colon/rectum tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or the nonperitonealized pericolic or perirectal soft tissues (finding)
pT3: Tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum) (finding)
Neoplasm of colon primary tumor staging category T3: Tumor invades through muscularis propria into pericolorectal tissues (finding)
